00020 #ifndef TRAILED_MONOTONIC_SET_H
00021 #define TRAILED_MONOTONIC_SET_H
00022 
00023 typedef bool value_type;
00024 
00025 class TrailedMonotonicSet
00026 {
00027   StateObj* stateObj;
00028 
00029   static const value_type tms_in_set = 1;
00030   
00031   D_DATA(bool locked;)
00032   
00033   int _size;
00034   int _max_undos;
00035   int _max_depth;             
00036 
00037   int _local_depth;             // could be unsigned 
00038   
00039   MoveablePointer _backtrack_depth_ptr;
00040   
00041   MemOffset _array;
00042   MemOffset _undo_indexes;
00043   
00044   //MoveablePointer backtrack_ptr;
00045 
00046   int& undo_indexes(int i)
00047   {
00048     return static_cast<int*>(_undo_indexes.get_ptr())[i]; 
00049   }
00050 
00051 public:
00052   // following allows external types destructive changes to array 
00053   // but we probably do not want to allow this to force them to use set()
00054   value_type& array(DomainInt i)
00055   { 
00056     D_ASSERT( i >= 0 && i < size());
00057     int val = checked_cast<int>(i);
00058     return static_cast<value_type*>(_array.get_ptr())[val]; 
00059   }
00060   
00061   const value_type& array(DomainInt i) const
00062   { 
00063     D_ASSERT( i >= 0 && i < size() && _array.get_ptr() != NULL);
00064     int val = checked_cast<int>(i);
00065     return static_cast<const value_type*>(_array.get_ptr())[val]; 
00066   }
00067 
00068   bool needs_undoing()
00069   {
00070     D_ASSERT( _local_depth < _max_depth && _local_depth >= (*((int*)_backtrack_depth_ptr.get_ptr())) );
00071 
00072     return _local_depth > (*((int*)_backtrack_depth_ptr.get_ptr()));
00073   }
00074 
00075   void undo()
00076   {
00077     int bt_depth = (*((int*)_backtrack_depth_ptr.get_ptr()));
00078 
00079 #ifdef DEBUG_TMS
00080     cout << "About to undo: " ; print_state(); 
00081 #endif
00082     D_ASSERT( _local_depth < (_max_depth+1) && _local_depth >= bt_depth && bt_depth >=0);
00083 
00084     for(; _local_depth > bt_depth; ) 
00085     {
00086       -- _local_depth;
00087       array(undo_indexes(_local_depth)) = tms_in_set ;
00088     }
00089 
00090 #ifdef DEBUG_TMS
00091     cout << "Just undone: " ; print_state(); 
00092 #endif
00093 
00094     D_ASSERT(_local_depth == bt_depth);
00095   }
00096 
00097   bool ifMember_remove(DomainInt index)
00098   {
00099 
00100          D_ASSERT( 0 <= index && index < size());
00101           if (array(index)) 
00102       { 
00103           undo_indexes(_local_depth) = checked_cast<int>(index);
00104           ++_local_depth;
00105          array(index) = 0;    
00106          return 1;
00107       }
00108       return 0;
00109   }
00110   
00111   bool isMember(DomainInt index) const
00112   {
00113     //cerr << "Size:"<< _size << ", index:"<<index<< ", array:" << _array.get_ptr() <<endl;
00114     return (bool)array(index);
00115   }
00116 
00117   void unchecked_remove(DomainInt index)
00118   {
00119     D_ASSERT( 0 <= index && index < size());
00120     undo_indexes(_local_depth) = checked_cast<int>(index);
00121     ++_local_depth;
00122     array(index) = 0;
00123   }
00124   
00125   
00126   int size() const
00127   {
00128     return _size;    
00129   }
00130 
00131 void before_branch_left()
00132   { *((int*)_backtrack_depth_ptr.get_ptr()) = _local_depth;
00133     return ; }
00134     
00135  void after_branch_left()  // nothing to do
00136   { return ; }
00137   
00138 void  before_branch_right()  // nothing to do
00139   { return ; }
00140 void after_branch_right()  // nothing to do
00141   { return ; }
00142 
00143     int request_storage(int allocsize)
00144     {
00145         D_ASSERT(!locked);
00146         // returns the index of the first element allocated.
00147         int blockindex=_size;
00148         _size=_size+allocsize;
00149         return blockindex;
00150     }
00151   
00152     // This should no longer be used. Use request_storage and lock instead.
00153   //void initialise(const int& new_size, const int& max_undos, StateObj stateObj);
00154 
00155   // Must be run before the lock for nonbacktrack.
00156   void lock(StateObj * stateObj);
00157   
00158   //TrailedMonotonicSet(StateObj* _stateObj) : stateObj(_stateObj) //, _backtrack_depth(_stateObj)
00159   //{ } 
00160   
00161   TrailedMonotonicSet() :
00162   #ifndef NO_DEBUG
00163   locked(false),
00164   #endif
00165   _size(0), _max_undos(0), _max_depth(0), _local_depth(0)
00166   { }
00167   
00168 void print_state()
00169 {
00170   cout << "printing state of TrailedMonotonicSet: " ;
00171   cout << "array size: " << _size;
00172   cout << " local depth: " << _local_depth;
00173   cout << " backtracking depth: " << *((int*)_backtrack_depth_ptr.get_ptr()) ; 
00174   cout << " max depth: " << _max_depth; 
00175   cout << endl << "   values: " ;
00176   for(int i = 0; i < _size; ++i) 
00177   { 
00178     cout << array(i) << " ";
00179   }
00180   cout << endl;
00181   cout << "  history: ";
00182   for(int i = 0; i < _local_depth ; ++i) 
00183   { 
00184     cout << "[" << undo_indexes(i) //<< ":" << undo_values(i) 
00185          << "] " ;
00186   }
00187   cout << endl ;
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 };
00192 
00193 typedef TrailedMonotonicSet MonotonicSet;
00194 #endif
